metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10167 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The gdImageCreateFromGd2Ctx function in gd_gd2.c in the GD Graphics Library(aka libgd) before 2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10167` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.6
libgd3 - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.6').
